name: Five Nights at Donkey Kong's
description:
Five Nights at Donkey Kong's is an indie horror game inspired by the horror game franchise Five Nights at Freddy's, fused with the characters of Donkey Kong and Diddy Kong.

Players must make their way through a night in Donkey Kong's tree house... however there is something wrong with Diddy Kong. You must keep Diddy Kong and whatever force possesses him at bay.

Do you have what it takes? Download to find out!
